import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./Cart.css"; const Cart = ({ cart, setCart }) => { const [price, setPrice] = useState(0); return (
Shopping Books
{cart.map((product) => (
{product.title} {product.author}
${product.price}
))}
Total Price of your Cart Rs - {price}
); }; export default Cart;
